title: Hidden Hobbies
alternative_title: Hidden Hobbies ; The Secret Class President's Hobby ; 은밀한 반장의 취미
status: Hidden Hobbies ; The Secret Class President's Hobby ; 은밀한 반장의 취미
description:
Description :
        Jun is a common and ordinary boy, class president of a prestigious school that only accepts the elite ... Everyone in the school admires him and there are too many rumors about him ... but none of them comes close about the true being of their president .Everything is going great until Mariam, the vice president, finds the class president sleeping dressed as ... A fun story involving an undercover hobby!+
